Name: Space Expand
About the game: Take control and expand your empire through different constellations in this minimalist 4X strategy game. - Up to 500 randomly generated worlds running in parallel and in real time. - Many intense battles in real time across your galactic sector. - Colonize and terraform new worlds or destroy planets already habited by other races or players. - Improve your planetary defenses, research and ship fleets. - Trade with players and form guilds to conquer many solar systems.
Meta Title: Space Expand: Feb 22, 2019, Fost Hope and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Space Expand? Check out the release date (Feb 22, 2019), developer insights from Fost Hope, and a complete game summary.
